## Welcome to Data Transformation Documentation

The [U.S. Greenhouse Gas (GHG) Center](https://earth.gov/ghgcenter) provides a cloud-based system for exploring and analyzing U.S. government and other curated greenhouse gas datasets.

You can find the jupyter notebooks for each dataset explaining how each dataset has been transformed from orifinal file to COGs.
Dataset **transformation** examples:

1. [CASA-GFED3 Land Carbon Flux](cog_transformation/casagfed-carbonflux-monthgrid-v3.ipynb)
2. [Air-Sea CO₂ Flux, ECCO-Darwin Model v5](cog_transformation/eccodarwin-co2flux-monthgrid-v5.ipynb)
3. [EMIT Methane Point Source Plume Complexes](cog_transformation/emit-ch4plume-v1.ipynb)
4. [U.S. Gridded Anthropogenic Methane Emissions Inventory](cog_transformation/epa-ch4emission-grid-v2express.ipynb)
5. [GOSAT-based Top-down Total and Natural Methane Emissions](cog_transformation/gosat-based-ch4budget-yeargrid-v1.ipynb)
6. [Wetland Methane Emissions from the LPJ-wsl model](cog_transformation/lpjwsl-wetlandch4-grid-v1.ipynb)
7. [OCO-2 MIP Top-Down CO₂ Budgets](cog_transformation/oco2-mip-co2budget-yeargrid-v1.ipynb)
8. [OCO-2 GEOS Column CO₂ Concentrations](cog_transformation/oco2geos-co2-daygrid-v10r.ipynb)
9. [ODIAC Fossil Fuel CO₂ Emissions](cog_transformation/odiac-ffco2-monthgrid-v2022.ipynb)
10. [SEDAC Gridded World Population Density](cog_transformation/sedac-popdensity-yeargrid5yr-v4.11.ipynb)
11. [TM5-4DVar Isotopic CH₄ Inverse Fluxes](cog_transformation/tm54dvar-ch4flux-monthgrid-v1.ipynb)
12. [Atmospheric Carbon Dioxide Concentrations from NOAA Global Monitoring Laboratory](cog_transformation/noaa-insitu.ipynb)
